backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data models, maps, authorization mixins, and query methods for benches, documents, components, history, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, state, validation, and feature functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application routing setup with TanStack Router, authentication gates, theming, and global error boundary.
Placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Gate component that waits for backend actor initialization and shows errors if the actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard that blocks access until Internet Identity is loaded and authenticated.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Generic draggable list component rendering reorderable items with drag handlers.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Hook managing drag-and-drop reordering state for lists, including drag start, over, end, and reset.
Provides the main app layout with navigation, theme toggle, logout handling, and an Outlet for routed pages.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows scroll-to-top and scroll-to-bottom buttons based on scroll position and performs smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Single-value tag input with suggestions, allowing adding, removing, and selecting predefined entities.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Renders a grid of predefined avatars and notifies selection changes.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Displays a user avatar from predefined or custom images with cache-busting and size options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
Zustand store that tracks a timestamp used to force-refresh avatar image URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Manages persistent chart type preference using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout logic, and identity persistence through context.
Periodically updates the user's last-seen timestamp via the backend actor when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks for fetching and mutating test benches, user profiles, roles, expiration settings, and related data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark CSS variables for colors, layout, and theme styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the Admin page.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Empty placeholder component for managing benches in the Admin panel.
Empty placeholder component for managing documents in the Admin panel.
Empty placeholder component for managing users in the Admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Displays detailed information about a single test bench, including components, history, and edit/remove actions.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Shows a searchable list of all test benches with filtering, photos, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Implements a modal dialog for creating new benches, handling form fields, uploads, validation, and component duplication.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Editable table for adding, editing, removing, and duplicating bench components with expiration status calculation.
Handles uploading, versioning, listing, and deleting categorized bench documents with progress tracking.
Displays sorted bench history entries showing actions, timestamps, user info, and optional details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error fallback handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Allows selecting document categories and adding files with versions for each category.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog for selecting benches and duplicating a component to multiple benches.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal for editing bench details, tags, URLs, and photo with validation and update submission.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Interactive tag input component allowing adding, removing, and selecting tags with suggestion filtering.
Provides a placeholder page describing planned features for creating new test benches.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Builds a pie chart summarizing component health status counts across benches.
Displays a bar chart of component criticality counts with optional bench filtering.
Generates a deadline-distribution bar chart grouping components into timeâ€‘range buckets with filters.
Renders a pie chart showing document counts grouped by category.
Shows monthly expiration trends of components using either bar or line charts.
Charts top benches by expired component count using bar or line visualization.
Displays overall component health by calculating status counts and showing percentage bars and totals.
Renders a customizable, reorderable set of statistic and chart cards summarizing bench and component data.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard assembly that loads benches, components, documents, computes expiration statuses, and renders sections with reordering.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page handling personal info, thresholds, avatar selection, and bench-specific settings.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign-in screen using Internet Identity with status handling and simple UI messaging.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Maps avatar IDs to asset paths and provides helpers to retrieve avatar paths and IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and converts a default bench photo into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads a document stored as an ExternalBlob by converting bytes into a downloadable file.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration thresholds and computes component expiration statuses based on profile settings.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates simple unique IDs using timestamps and random strings.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Cleans and normalizes description text by fixing whitespace, capitalization, punctuation, and standard abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Filters benches by checking whether all query terms appear in their combined searchable fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing behavior.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Includes validators for email, domain-restricted email, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related build files, enabling ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, env injection, path aliases, dev server proxy, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending requests related to component duplication workflows.
